Razor Claw rolled along the ground. his body shifting from robot to Raptor =
to something warped. His form was indescribeable, sort of a blur of abstrac=
t painting and a jello mold he screamed in pain as the virus continued to c=
onsume him. His mutated dinobot DNA was warping around him like a war betwe=
en the bot and the beast. He screamed again, curling up into a ball trying =
to regain control. He was both a wounded beast and a scared childlike bot a=
ll in one.. 
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, February 23, 2001 9:09 AM
  Subject: Re: =
is that the best you got?


  ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::
   
      Wolve=
ritron went to kick at the fallen bot, but Eclipse stopped him. "He's badel=
y injured, he's going to need a CR chamber."
      Ramus commed the CF (If =
it's still functional and not in lock down.) "We need a CR chamber, any nea=
r the area?"
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, February 23, 2001 6:28 AM
    S=
ubject: Re: is that the best you got?


    sometimes I get tired of it too=
. Since Wolveritron was hit by Razor claws foot I take it he was cut.

    =
Razor Claw fealt the feal of mech fluid on the claws on his feet. He was pl=
eased with himself. He ducked his head forward making the blow to his neck =
miss. He curled backward feeling the slash in the back.

    A sudden gut f=
ealing told him he was badly hurt as a set of claws ripped into him. The ra=
ptor screamed in pain collapsing to the ground convulsing and spitting mech=
 fluid. His body jerked back and forth.

    Razor Claw transformed to bot =
mode, the virus causing it to appear to mealt back to protoform. "What have=
 you done to me!!!!!" He yelled, his rage welling up inside of him. He feal=
t no pain as he collapsed in shock not knowing why such little damage would=
 cause such a reaction.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: dac=
hande 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Thursday, February 22,=
 2001 7:32 AM
      Subject: Re: is that the best you got?


      Actully,=
 I'm getting tired of this RPG
       
      ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
=
       
          Wolveritron got hit by the foot. He swung his claws on hi=
s left hand out at the raptor, aiming for the next. His right hand claws sw=
ung for the guys gut.
          Eclipse went around to the back out the bot=
, and started to claw at his back. Ramus used his arm blades and started to=
 claw at his right side.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From=
: CYBERWOLF4 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, F=
ebruary 22, 2001 11:03 AM
        Subject: is that the best you got?


    =
    12 blasts from three sides huh. bad move for the ones on the left and r=
ight. OK hows this?

        Razor Claw forced his way forward getting pumm=
eled by the majority of the shots. He lept upward causing some of the shots=
 from the side to head toward the opposite bot. The bleeding raptor worked =
his way close enough to Wolveritron where future shots could hit either one=
. he slashed at the bot with his clawed feat. "Fight for yourself coward yo=
ur friends will have more than enough opportunities to die later, nows your=
 turn. Do you here the Matrix calling you home?" The beast had lost it's mi=
nd or it would have thought to hold still and use his forcefield instead of=
 getting beat upon in a three on one fight.

        (Come on Dachande you =
afraid of a little scratch?)

          ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
     From: dachande 
          To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: =
Wednesday, February 21, 2001 9:16 AM
          Subject: Re: Dachande did yo=
u forget?


          I must have.
           
          ::Eclipse/Wolverit=
ron/Ramus::
           
              They all fired their weapons at the r=
aptor, and the were to the front of him, the left and the right. Each 4 tim=
es.
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: CYBERWOLF4 =

            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, Febru=
ary 21, 2001 11:54 AM
            Subject: Fw: Dachande did you forget?


 =
           heres the last post I have for the fight between Razor Claw and =
Wolveritron.
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: CY=
BERWOLF4 
            To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Monday,=
 February 12, 2001 7:31 AM
            Subject: Re: Dachande respond or els=
e


            Razor Claw glared at the three opponents with hate in his e=
yes and drool dripping from his jaw. The raptor no longer had control of hi=
s actions and wouldn't be stopped until justice had been served. "You fear =
me." He states through a half closed mouth. 

            He looked back at=
 his origional prey, "You fear me so much that you will not fight one on on=
e." He took a few steps forward lowering his head to the level of Wolveritr=
on so they could look eye to eye. The anger and hatred split the air as the=
 two looked toward each other. The teeth of one and the claws of the acused=
 reflected in the light around. Two bots enter, one bot leaves and if Razor=
 Claw had his way the Wolverine in bot mode would be the apetizer.


      =
        ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: dachande 
       =
       To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
              Sent: Sunday, February 11,=
 2001 6:30 AM
              Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


       =
       ::Wolveritron/Eclipse/Ramus::
               
                  "I f=
ight you now, bubb" Wolveritron said. "Because you ticked me off."
        =
          Eclipse transformed to his full out battle mode, standing at nine=
 feet tall. His claws extended to their full length, 5 inches. His teeth we=
re gleaming, they were ready to have mech fluid on them.
                  =
Ramus pulled his crossbow up and aimed it at Razor Claw.
                  =
"We're ready for ya," They said. They would not make the first move, though=
.
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: CYBER=
WOLF4 
                To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                Sent: Su=
nday, February 11, 2001 9:38 AM
                Subject: Re: Dachande respo=
nd or else


                Razor Claw rolled out the busted windshield us=
ing the tuck and roll technique to avoid excessive damage. 

              =
  "You decide to fight after all I see." the raptor yells in his rage. he c=
harges forward biting at Wolveritron. "You fight me now, after leaving your=
 team to fight alone? I will kill you slowly."


                  ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
                  From: dachande 
                  T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
                  Sent: Saturday, February 10, 2=
001 7:47 AM
                  Subject: Re: Dachande respond or else


     =
             He is.
                   
                  ::Wolveritron/Ecl=
ipse/Ramus::
                   
                      His claws dropped fr=
om his hands. "Who said I'm lettin others fight for me, Bub?"
             =
         "Wolveritron, this is what he wants," Eclipse said, putting his ha=
nd out, holding Wolveritron back. "Don't give it to him."
                 =
     "Don't tell me who I can fight," Wolveritron said.
                   =
   Ramus pulled his energy crossbow out (He's a twin of Ramulus). "I have n=
o problem giving him what he wants."
                      He didn't fire t=
hough.
